body: query {merchantprovidergrouplist ({argumentation}) { merchantprovidergroups { id, merchantproviderconfigurations { merchantprovider { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio}, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on TestMerchantProvider { name } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description }, created_at, updated_at }, distribution }, created_at, updated_at }, pagination { count, end_cursor, has_next_page, last_evaluated } }, }
